Principal Data Scientist (Remote)United States200,000-220,000 + BenefitsThe CompanyThis company is a growing marketing tech firm. This company helps intersect marketing and advertising technology by helping different advertisers understand exactly what their customers are looking for within their ads.ResponsibilitiesInvolved with Marketing and advertisement services at current companyA technically hands-on role with the expectation to ask questions and go deeper into the nuances of the product to create significant advancements.Very technically savvy, working with deep learning algorithms, AI, and MLopsDeliver end-to-end implementation of data science tasks including algorithm development, dashboarding, research, and insights into future developments in marketing.Working with and mentoring other data scientistsYour Skills And ExperienceA successful Senior Data Scientist will likely have the following skills and experience:Strong machine learning experience and AIExperience with deep learning algorithmsMaster's degree in Statistics, Data Science, Mathematics, or a related field.Proven experience in data science in client relationship management, marketing, and direct marketing.Marketing experience, and advertising experienceHighly functional knowledge of Python/R, SQL, and Machine Learning libraries.Strong collaboration and communication skills.BenefitsA competitive base salary of $200,000-220,000 + benefitsHow To ApplyPlease register your interest by sending your résumé to Emma Wright via the Apply link on this page.KEYWORDSConsulting, Machine Learning, Data Science, Research, Technology, Marketing, Advertising, Stakeholder Management, Product Management, Client Facing, Analytics, Predictive Modeling, ML, Python, R, SQL, Statistics
